name: Juicy Cauldron
description:
Made for Ludum-Dare 49

A difficult platformer-shooter game where your goal is to create the greatest juice ever while trying to avoid making the cauldron unstable!

Throw tennis balls at balloons to try and dunk them into the cauldron, but be careful!  You want to avoid everything that isn't wanted, except candy, to increase the value of your juice!  Once you meet the goal, you completed the level!

There are 8 levels, with numerous new mechanics and specialties, plus an endless mode that brings back the old mechanics and to see if you are truly worthy of the title 'Master Juicer'!

Controls:

W/A/S/D = move / menus

space = select

mouse = aim

left mouse = charge & shoot

Programs/Softwares used:

Programming : Gamemaker Studio 2 - https://www.yoyogames.com/en

Art : Aesprite - https://www.aseprite.org/

Music : Beepbox - https://www.beepbox.co/

SFX : Bfxr - https://www.bfxr.net/
